item.title: Now
item.description: Last updated 2022-02-23 ‚Ä¢ What is a “now page”? Living Still in San Francisco Reading I’m rereading Martin Kleppmann’s excellent Designing Data-Intensive Applications and associated whitepapers. After sitting at the top of my to read list for a while, I’ve been really enjoying John Steinbeck’s East of Eden. Watching Warriors basketball, Go Dubs! Listening I’ve made a Spotify playlist of what I’m listening to each season for the past 8 years, here is Winter ‘21.
